content.p: Engineering. Architecture. Design Follow us on LinkedIn The University of Nottingham is the ideal place to study for your PhD in engineering, architecture, and design. We believe that great minds don’t think alike. We welcome students from across the world into our friendly research community. Here you'll have access to our sector-leading research facilities, be guided by our expert academics, and contribute towards our pioneering research. This is the place where you get the space, support, skills and connections to solve real world challenges. Whether you are designing the places of tomorrow, creating cutting-edge tools and technologies, or helping make a greener planet spin a little smoother – we’ll be here to support you. Get ready to shape the real world. Browse our range of PhD's below including our available funded PhD studentships. View individual CDTs to see details of their research and how to apply for a PhD hosted by them. Please note not all CDTs are currently recruiting new postgraduate researchers. We lead on two university CDTs. We link to CDTs led by other faculties. We partner with CDTs led by other universities. Read about our amazing PhD researchers. Find out about their research and why they chose the University of Nottingham. Materials Engineering and Materials Design PhD Electrical and Electronic Engineering PhD Sustainable Energy Technology PhD Manufacturing Engineering PhD Mechanical Engineering PhD Sustainable Hydrogen CDT Search for a supervisor in engineering or architecture Our guide to the postgraduate application process Funding opportunities for engineering and architecture students Explore engineering and architecture studentships
